About KWICC

KWICC, pronounced as quick (KAAZING WebSocket Inter-Cloud Connectivity), is a software tool that offers on-demand, secure hybrid cloud connectivity. It allows companies to safely extend the reach of their enterprise services to their partners and customers without the complexity or expense of additional networking products or technologies such as a VPN.

Is KWICC for me?

KWICC was created to help customers simplify and improve connectivity when there is a need to broaden the reach of their native services beyond the corporate firewall to the extended enterprise.

How can I give it a try?

KWICC is FREE! To get your hands on it, simply fill out the registration form. And icing on the cake is: if you're among the first 500 registrants, we send you a book about the technology underpinning KWICC: The Definitive Guide to HTML5 WebSocket.

Give it a try. It's FREE!


The first 500 registrants receive a free book.
